name: Binary ExtendScript Script File
summary: Learn about .JSXBIN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To export a JSXBIN file using the ExtendScript Toolkit, select File â†’ Export as Binary... while you have a JSX file open.
NOTE: JSXBIN files are not necessarily JavaScript files, since ExtendScript supports extra functionality that JavaScript does not.

description: Binary script created by ExtendScript Toolkit (ESTK), a tool used to add extensions to Adobe Creative Suite (CS) applications; contains the binary version of a .JSX file, which is written using ExtendScript, an extended version of JavaScript; used for distributing CS extensions and for protecting scripts by making them non-human readable.
